manifests.purpose: Site-wide machine manifest listing page and treatment definitions with hero IDs, section stacks, and CTA slots.
manifests.notes: Primary source for getPageManifestBySlug, getSectionStackForPage, and CTA slot resolution.

manifests.purpose: Main navigation links and ordering for the marketing site header.
manifests.notes: Normalized by getMainNavItems for header rendering.

manifests.purpose: Brand canon information bundled into the manifest registry for completeness.
manifests.notes: Exported via champagneManifestRegistry; no direct runtime lookups observed.

manifests.purpose: Style tokens for heroes and sections, including hero presets keyed by ID and section surface hints.
manifests.notes: getHeroManifest merges hero presets from this file; getSectionStyle surfaces section type/surface mappings.

manifests.purpose: Archived Manus import manifest kept in registry for reference.
manifests.notes: Registered in champagneManifestRegistry but not read elsewhere.

manifests.purpose: State-machine style journey manifest for the smile makeover experience.
manifests.notes: Available via getJourneys/getJourneyManifest; no in-app consumers detected.

manifests.purpose: Media deck asset references for the implants route and contexts.
manifests.notes: Exported via getMediaDecks/getMediaDeck; no direct page usage found.

manifests.purpose: Fallback section ordering by route/page type when no layout or explicit sections exist.
manifests.notes: Used by getSectionStackForPage when no explicit layout or page manifest sections are present.

manifests.purpose: Default FX behaviors per section type (parallax, fades, shimmer flags).
manifests.notes: Exposed through getSectionFxDefaults and used in sections debug tooling.

manifests.purpose: Reduced-motion defaults for sections (parallax reduction, shimmer/spotlight toggles).
Registry of section components, import paths, and default variants keyed by ID.
manifests.notes: Available through getSectionLibrary; no direct renderer lookup observed yet.

manifests.purpose: Section layout for the aligners treatment route with ordered component instances.
manifests.notes: Loaded into champagneSectionLayouts; routeId is treatments.aligners (not clear-aligners).

manifests.purpose: Section layout manifest for the implants treatment route (ordered sections and variants).
manifests.notes: Used by getSectionStackForPage when the routeId is treatments.implants.

manifests.purpose: Section layout manifest for the veneers treatment route (ordered sections and variants).
manifests.notes: Used by getSectionStackForPage when the routeId is treatments.veneers.

manifests.purpose: Base sacred hero defaults (content, tone, surfaces, layout).
manifests.notes: Merged into the runtime via loadSacredHeroManifests before HeroRuntime assembly.

manifests.purpose: Sacred hero surface asset map used to resolve tokens to files.
manifests.notes: Converted to a HeroSurfaceDefinitionMap by buildSurfaceDefinitionMap.

manifests.purpose: Sacred hero variant definitions keyed by variant IDs and treatment slugs.
manifests.notes: Normalized and used for variant selection in HeroRuntime.

manifests.purpose: Time-of-day hero overrides for tone, surfaces, layout, motion, and film grain.
manifests.notes: Weather overrides merged into runtime when timeOfDay is provided.

duplicatesOrArchives.notes: Legacy copy of the machine manifest stored under _imports; no code imports reference the _imports namespace.
Another archived machine manifest copy inside _imports documentation.
Archived Manus import manifest; runtime uses packages/champagne-manifests/data/manus_import_unified_manifest_20251104.json instead.
Brand manifest copy within imported documentation; active runtime imports packages/champagne-manifests/data/manifest.public.brand.json.
